name: Radial Finance
public_notice: The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en: Radial is a Convex-inspired yield maximization protocol for Solidly which enables LPs to receive boosted rewards while eliminating the need to lock veSOLID themselves. In addition to optimizing for gas (albeit being a small amount on Fantom), managing proportion of SOLID locked to optimally boost yields and promote favourable gauges — the protocol acts as a focal point of coordination between LPs, DAOs/protocols and various veSOLID lockers.
